data.title: Chestnut Festival in Magliano Vetere, Salerno: 8,9,10 December 2022
data.meta_description: In Magliano Vetere, in the province of Salerno, a new Festival dedicated to the Chestnut. Here is all the information about the event.
data.text:
This year there seems to be almost no room for other typical foods, le chestnuts they are conquering every country in Campania. There are many successes obtained from this fruit, but apparently the appointments with roasted chestnuts have not yet come to an end.

Another festival featuring the chestnut will be held in December, we are talking about Chestnut Festival in Magliano Vetere.

Tasty event will be held from8 December 2022. It will continue on the days of 9 and 10 December.

The culinary appointment was organized by pro loco Magliano and focuses precisely on the much desired chestnut. The event was already made official in October via the organizers' fanpage. In fact, at that time the party had placed an advertisement for research participants.

It is not the first time that this type of party has been organised, even in the 2017 there was a successful edition that in addition to hosting this one titbit typical offered to visitors also live music and popular music.

Information on the Chestnut Festival
